EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_Pivotal/EMA_Data Analytics in Cloud_Q216.Post-event - Attended
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: Thank You for Attending Analytics in the Cloud: Getting The Most Out Of Analytics Deployments
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for attending our webinar Analytics in the Cloud: Getting The Most Out Of Analytics Deployments. We hope you found it enjoyable and informative as you explore your Big Data technology options. As mentioned during the webinar, you can view the recording and download the slide deck at the links below:
- Watch the webinar recording <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/analytics-in-the-cloud]]> - Download the webinar presentation <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/analytics-in-the-cloud]]>
Additional Big Data and analytics resources:
- Shaping the Future of Data Warehousing through Open Source Software <[[http://pivotal.io/shaping-the-future-of-data-warehousing-through-open-source-software]]> - Big & Fast Data: The Democratization of Information <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/white-paper/capgemini-big-fast-data-democratization-of-information]]> - Transforming Business Results with Big Data and Analytics <[[http://pivotal.io/transforming-business-results-with-big-data-and-analytics]]> - Operationalizing the Buzz: Big Data Analytics <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/analyst-report/operationalizing-the-buzz]]>
Finally, consider joining us in Las Vegas at SpringOne Platform <[[http://springoneplatform.io]]>, August 1â€“4. SpringOne Platform brings together the people, process and tools for delivering and operating data-driven software services. There will be in-depth advanced technical topics and accessible introductory content covering data science, machine learning, microservices, agile, continuous delivery, devops, and more. Register today <[[https://2016.event.springoneplatform.io/register]]>.
If you would like more information or have any questions about Big Data and data science, submit your question and contact information at pivotal.io/contact <[[http://pivotal.io/contact]]>.
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
